alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 25 at 4:47PM MDT until March 26 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT /4 AM CDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Up to 1 inch of additional accumulation possible. Winds from the northwest at 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Yuma County. In Nebraska, Dundy and Hitchcock Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MDT /4 AM CDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, slow down, turn off cruise control, and exercise additional caution, particularly at intersections and highway on-ramps and off-ramps where accidents are more likely to occur. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
